00062 #ifndef REGION_H
00063 #define REGION_H
00064 
00065 typedef struct region_member
00066 {
00067   union
00068   {
00069     Node *node;
00070     L_Cb *cb;
00071   }
00072   member;
00073   struct region_member *nextMember;
00074 }
00075 RegionMember;
00076 
00077 #define _RegionMemberNode(a)    (a)->member.node
00078 #define _RegionMemberCb(a)      (a)->member.cb
00079 
00080 typedef struct region_alloc
00081 {
00082   unsigned short vregId;
00083   unsigned char rclass;
00084   unsigned char flags;
00085   short baseIndex;
00086   short physReg;
00087   short spillLocation;
00088   struct region_alloc *nextAlloc;
00089 }
00090 RegionAlloc;
00091 
00092 #define REGION_ALLOCATED_FIRST  0x01
00093 #define REGION_SPILLED_FIRST    0x02
00094 
00095 #define _RegionAllocVregId(a)           (a)->vregId
00096 #define _RegionAllocBaseIndex(a)        (a)->baseIndex
00097 #define _RegionAllocPhysReg(a)          (a)->physReg
00098 #define _RegionAllocClass(a)            (a)->rclass
00099 #define _RegionAllocFlags(a)            (a)->flags
00100 #define _RegionAllocSpillLocation(a)    (a)->spillLocation
00101 #define _RegionAllocNext(a)             (a)->nextAlloc
00102 
00103 typedef struct region
00104 {
00105   int id;
00106   int classId;
00107   int classId1;
00108   char *rclass;
00109   unsigned char flags;
00110   double weight;
00111   Set members;
00112   Node *seed;
00113   RegionMember *memberList;
00114   RegionMember *enterList;
00115   RegionMember *exitList;
00116 
00117   /* Allocation result of flyby virtual registers */
00118   RegionAlloc *allocList;
00119   HashTable regionAllocHashTbl;
00120 
00121   struct region *nextRegion;
00122 }
00123 Region;
00124 
00125 #define REGION_ALLOCATED        0x1
00126 
00127 #define _RegionFlags(a)         (a)->flags
00128 
00129 #define inRegionCb(region,cb)   (Set_in((region)->members,(cb)->id))
